record.title: RECOGNIZING MEADOW, SOUTH DAKOTA
record.narrative:
RECOGNIZING MEADOW, SOUTH DAKOTA -- (Senate - July 23, 2007)

[Page: S9773]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, today I wish to recognize Meadow, SD. The town of Meadow will celebrate the 100th anniversary of its founding this year.

Meadow, located in Perkins County, was founded in 1907. Since its beginning, Meadow has been a strong reflection of South Dakota's values and traditions. As they celebrate this milestone anniversary, I am confident that Meadow will continue to thrive and succeed for the next 100 years.
I would like to offer my congratulations to the citizens of Meadow on this milestone anniversary and wish them continued prosperity in the years to come.
